border.comment: The value of border for Dividers.

decoration.comment: The text decoration of the Accordion item summary.

align.comment: The text-align value of the Accordion item summary.

active-text-decoration.comment: The text decoration of the Accordion item summary when active.

color.comment: The font color of the Accordion item summary.

background-color.comment: The background color of the Accordion item summary.

content-padding.comment: The padding of the Accordion content.

active-background-color.comment: The background color used for hover and active on items in the Accordion.
